publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3060# Marilyn Livingstone: National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse—That the Parliament welcomes the work of the Cross-Party group on survivors of childhood sexual abuse on co-ordinating and developing an outline national strategy for children and adults who have experienced sexual abuse during childhood and, in the light of recommendations made by the recent independent inquiry commissioned by Fife Council following the conviction of David Logan Murphy, believes that the Scottish Executive should actively develop a national strategy, based on the work of the cross-party group, that considers the wide social, health, mental and legal implications of sexual abuse and its impact on survivors and society as a whole.
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Scott Barrie*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-3060# Marilyn Livingstone: National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse—That the Parliament welcomes the work of the Cross-Party group on survivors of childhood sexual abuse on co-ordinating and developing an outline national strategy for children and adults who have experienced sexual abuse during childhood and, in the light of recommendations made by the recent independent inquiry commissioned by Fife Council following the conviction of David Logan Murphy, believes that the Scottish Executive should actively develop a national strategy, based on the work of the cross-party group, that considers the wide social, health, mental and legal implications of sexual abuse and its impact on survivors and society as a whole. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Maureen Macmillan, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Christine Grahame*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Keith Harding*, Helen Eadie*, Janis Hughes*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Kate Maclean*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Karen Whitefield*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Margaret Jamieson*, Pauline McNeill*, David Mundell*, Elaine Thomson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Cathy Peattie*, Tricia Marwick*, Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3060# National Strategy for Survivors of Childhood Sexual Abuse (lodged on 1 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
